trans-unit.source: Specifies the concrete data format and protocols used in the XML Web service.
The `Binding` class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<binding>` element enclosed by the root `<definitions>` element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> class.
Gets the collection of extensibility elements used in the XML Web service.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtensionCollection"></xref> object that contains the collection of extensibility elements used in the XML Web service.
Gets the collection of specifications for data formats and message protocols used in the action supported by the XML Web service.

An <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBindingCollection"></xref> object that contains the collection of specifications for data formats and message protocols used in the action supported by the XML Web service.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> is a member.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> is a member.
Gets or sets a value representing the namespace-qualified name of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> with which the `Binding` is associated.
The default value is an empty string ("").
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> with which the `Binding` is associated.
